repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The volume 6 of a 7-volume Rāmāyaṇam (BnF Indien 279-285).
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

supportDesc.foliation: Left-marginal Parallel Tamil and Arabic numerals foliation (U2).

collation.desc: the front cover. BnF shelfmark sticker on front cover, recto.
1 folio = Yuttakkāṇṭam: Title Page (in French). No foliation. Verso blank.
435 folios = Yuttakkāṇṭam: Text. Tamil foliation 1-435. Parallel Arabic foliation 1-435.
1 folio = back guard leaf. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc:
Description of the contents on a detached paper sheet:
N° 23 14 Mr Ducler
Ce livre s'appelle Ramayename ou Histoire de Ramare,
Composé en Vers par Cambane
Tome Sixième
Contenant 435. Feuilles.
C'est le livre dont on se sert pour deferer le serment. (ereur)
The number corresponds to the number series in the catalogue of Velanguani Arokium (1845, p. 14, nos. 14-20), although in reverse order. This note is not by the habitual hand for these contents descriptions on detached paper sheets found in Ducler's manuscripts.
BnF current shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 281 (front cover, recto).

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1830 by Vinson (in Vinson et al. 1866-) and to 1830 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably Ducler's provenance). By Ducler's scribe, working around 1830. Probably not before 1828 (date of the earliest internally dated Ducler's manuscript). Not later than its first mention (Burnouf 1832).

provenance.p: Copied for Philippe Ducler by an unnamed copyist in Karaikal Jail. See Burnouf (1832).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 79.

listBibl.bibl: Burnouf, Eugène. 1832. Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique. Journal asiatique 10: 84-91. — See p. 89, n0. 23.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 42, n0. 284.
Velanguani Arokium [Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam]. 1845. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls de la Bibliothèque royale. BnF NAF 5443. — See p. 14, nos. 14-20.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 65r, no. 256-262 279-285.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

ab.seg: Sixième Partie du Ramayename ou Histoire de Ramare

body.ab:
Uyiṟṟa
kāṇṭam
kaṭal kā
ṇ paṭalam
Oṉṟe
